course.title: Principles and Practice of Drug Development
course.faculty_text: Lee L. Rubin and Stan Neil Finkelstein (Medical School)
course.description: Critical assessment of the major issues and stages of developing a pharmaceutical or biopharmaceutical. Drug discovery, preclinical development, clinical investigation, manufacturing and regulatory issues considered for small and large molecules. Economic considerations of the drug development process.
course.notes: Classes held at MIT. BCMP 230 is also offered as SCRB 230. Students may not take both for credit.
